team.team_strength: The founding team comprises experienced entrepreneurs with a background in technology startups.
team.network_strength: The network includes tech-savvy professionals and advisors involved in urban transportation.

market.SOM: Covers 50% of entire US market by expanding into major cities like SF, NYC, LA, Chicago, Houston, PA, Dallas.

product.stage: Initial service area started in Central SF, with expansion plans to Manhattan.
product.USP: Luxury service on-demand with a modern, fuel-efficient fleet and a high-tech solution for geo-aware auto-dispatch.
product.customer_acquisition: Members only service that ensures respectable clientele, using professional networking and tech integrations.

revenue_growth.ARR: Target $1B+ in yearly revenue in best-case scenario.

traction.user_growth: Progress reported with recruitment of 5 advisors & 15 clients
traction.engagement: Guaranteed fast response times, luxurious service

funding.amount: Raise a few million for small office and general manager in SF

financial_efficiency.unit_economics: Designed to be profitable with pre-paid, cashless billing system.

miscellaneous.regulatory_risk: Bypass medallion system with digital hailing for member-only service.
miscellaneous.geographic_focus: Based in the United States, initially focusing on SF and NYC.
miscellaneous.timing_fad_risk: Positioning as a next-generation car service with lasting efficiency and convenience advantages.
